review.title: “Stressful and demoralizing”
review.pros: Pros – Compensation is good and they are good with food and fun events. The financial management is good and stable. Great personnel and camaraderie.
review.cons: Cons – Company relies on long hours and shortcuts to compensate for lack of investment in tools, personnel and training. Very much top-down management by edict, which leaves people scrambling and reactive. Communication is abysmal.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Focus on your employees and not your bonuses, and collaboration over command.

review.title: “Left out to dry”
review.pros: Pros – Most people are likable, and they love to party.
review.cons: Cons – No training, management unreachable, supervisor more concerned with own commissions not helpfull to team.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Do your job. Be available to team for questions and help. Don't say you are and then never available. Foster team so they can produce and grow.

review.title: “Energy draining”
review.pros: Pros – Compensation was very fair for the work compared to competition. Good, smart people. Products seem to be keeping up with the competition.
review.cons: Cons – Benefits are lacking. Energy draining environment. Depressing. CEO doesn't seem to really understand the business or have the drive to grow it.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to spend some time and money on Employee morale. Share the long term plan with the employees as there doesn't seem to be one.
